Setup - compile retroshare-nogui. You need a patched version at the moment. This is very easy if you use the PKGBUILD file in genesis/plugins/retroshare 1. copy the PKGBUILD to a empty directory 2. run makepkg 3. run sudo pacman -S name-of-package - create a user account on Archlinux. Name this account "retroshare", or change RETROSHARE_OS_USER in genesis/plugins/retroshare/main.py
What works? - create new Retroshare Identity/Location - start/stop locations, view status running/stopped - enable ssh menue system and ssh-rpc - you can use the rswebui-plugin to control retroshare-nogui: https://gitorious.org/rswebui/rswebui (only one instance can use rswebui, because there is only one port 9090) - the PKGBUILD has rswebui already included. Open http://your_arkos_machine:9090 in your Browser
